org.grouplens.lenskit.data.history

Interface UserHistorySummarizer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EventCountUserHistorySummarizer, RatingVectorUserHistorySummarizer

    @DefaultImplementation(value=RatingVectorUserHistorySummarizer.class)
public interface UserHistorySummarizer
    Summarize user histories as real-valued vectors.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Class<? extends Event> eventTypeWanted()
      Get the supertype of all events required by this summarizer.
      SparseVector summarize(UserHistory<? extends Event> history)
      Compute a vector summary of a user's history.

    • Method Detail

      • eventTypeWanted

        java.lang.Class<? extends Event> eventTypeWanted()
        Get the supertype of all events required by this summarizer.
        Returns:
        A type such that any type used by this summarizer is a subtype of it.

      • summarize

        @Nonnull
SparseVector summarize(@Nonnull
                             UserHistory<? extends Event> history)
        Compute a vector summary of a user's history.
        Parameters:
        history - The history to summarize.
        Returns:
        A vector summarizing the user's history.
